English: x is included in the rent
hungarian: x benne van a bérleti díjban

English: Call and book a house showing now!
I found a housing advertisement online.
hungarian: Találtam egy lakás hirdetést a neten.

English: I found a housing ad in the paper.
I would like to come see this apartment.
hungarian: Szeretnék eljönni és megnézni ezt a lakást.

English: When could I come to see the apartment?
Is there a sauna in the building?
Is there a common laundry room in the building?
Is it allowed to keep pets in the apartment?
How many square meters is the apartment?
What kind of renovations are coming (planned)?
Can I get a parking spot?
Have there been water damage in the building?
Is there a broadband connection in the building?
Has the home already been vacated?

Finnish: Kuinka kauan asunto on ollut tyhjänä?
English: How long has the home been empty?

Finnish: Kuinka pitkään asunto on ollut myytävänä?
English: How long has the home been for sale?
When will the home be vacated?
On what basis is the new tenant chosen?
hungarian: Mi alapján választják ki a bérlőt?

English: When will it be decided, who gets the home?
hungarian: Mikor dől el, hogy kié lesz a lakás?

English: The water bill is included in the rent.
hungarian: A vízdíjat a bérleti díj tartalmazza.

English: The bathroom has a washing machine connection.
There's an electric stove in the kitchen.
There's plenty of cupboard space in the home.
All the services are present near the home.
hungarian: Minden szolgáltatás közel van az apartmanhoz.

English: There's a kindergarten near to the home.
There's no elevator in the building.
Elisa's 10 Mbit/s broadband is included in the rent.
hungarian: Az Elisa 10 Mbit/s-os szélessávja benne van a bérleti díjban.

English: Tenant selection is made based on the applications.
hungarian: A bérlő kiválasztása jelentkezések alapján történik.
